plot: Theo and Thea want to make a movie of Snow White, but Gerard Joling, who should play prince, cries off. Someone suggests to ask opera singer Marco Bakker. First he doesn't want to, but when...
title: Theo en Thea en de ontmaskering van het tenenkaasimperium
